price: በዚህም ቁርኣን ውስጥ ከምሳሌው ሁሉ ለሰዎች በእርግጥ መላለስን፡፡ አብዛኞቹም ሰዎች ክህደትን እንጂ ሌላን እምቢ አሉ፡፡
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ صَرَّفۡنَا لِلنَّاسِ فِي هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٖ فَأَبَىٰٓ أَكۡثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ إِلَّا كُفُورٗا

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ṣarrafnā lilnnāsi fī hādhā al-qur'āni min kulli mathalin fa-abā aktharu al-nāsi illā kufūran
